Fluffy holds Power Rank #0 in Criozevanâ€™s informal power hierarchy. This rank exists for only one entity. The designation Meta was created because every other classification failed to accommodate what Fluffy represents â€” a level of power that operates above the laws and limitations that govern even god-tier practitioners and Arashi members.

What is known about Fluffy is almost nothing confirmed. The name itself is reported secondhand â€” those who have encountered Fluffy and survived to file any coherent account are few enough to count, and their accounts diverge in almost every particular except one: the experience was unlike anything else they had encountered, and their existing frameworks for understanding power were insufficient to process it.

Whether Fluffy has goals, allegiances, or a coherent agenda is debated by every organization with the resources to have the debate. The consensus is that standard organizational logic does not apply â€” Fluffy is not pursuing resources, territory, or influence by any recognized method. Whether this means Fluffyâ€™s goals are entirely alien, entirely absent, or simply invisible to the scale at which organizations operate is unresolved.

The Crimson Knight (Power Rank #2) is the one figure in Criozevan believed to have had meaningful contact with Fluffy and discussed it coherently afterward. He has declined to explain what that means for anyone elseâ€™s safety.
